column5: The mrs,s and I now drive down to Highland farms to do our grocery shopping.It,s so clean and everything is soooooo fresh.It,s well worth the drive in our opinion.When we were done we hit the shoppe.  Walk in the door an meet Steve Roth,then bump into Roger(BPS,yep he,s still working there) Then as we headed to the cash,meet up with John (RHYBAK) and his wife.In the line up, theres Chuck (BIGCHEVY). Good seeing some of the ol faces.  For lunch, we had or weekend PHO fill.
MMMMmmmm....pho....so good!  Was at the good ol' BPS yesterday myself
Your pappy never tell you to shop local ??
pretty sure I saw RambleOn from a distance sure, not 100% though
Highland Farms is tops, compared to the dirty markets here Wayne.  Plus it,s a day out for us.
